'''Uffo Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Uffo was the second son of [[Otto Boffin]] and [[Lavender Grubb]]. He married [[Sapphira Brockhouse]] and had two children, [[Gruffo Boffin|Gruffo]] and [[Gerda Boffin|Gerda]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
